CustomField.formula: MailingStreet__c & BR() & MailingStreet2__c & IF(LEN(MailingStreet2__c)>0, BR(), "") & MailingCity__c & IF(LEN(MailingCity__c) > 0, ", ", "") & MailingState__c & " " & MailingPostalCode__c & IF(LEN(MailingCountry__c)>0, BR() & MailingCountry__c, "")
CustomField.label: Mailing Address
